name: Home is Where the Heart Is (katjkornegay)
name_original: Home is Where the Heart Is (katjkornegay)
description:
Viruses have taken over your host's body! Run and shoot to make it to the heart and defeat the King Virus!

Created in 48 hours for Chillennium 2023

Theme: We Share a Heart

Team Members: Brooke Slaughter, Joel Barnhill, Kat Kornegay & Xavier Flores

Software Used: Unreal Engine 5, Autodesk Maya 2022, Adobe Substance Painter, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Audition
